title: Whats your biggest weakness in game???
body: Title, what is your biggest weakness when it comes to playing league of legends, for me personally, it would be playing predictively in lane, say when I was in a ranked game as Lux vs LeBlanc, I had a lot of trouble trading because she was tricky to hit because of her mobility, I'd throw out a Q but she'd blink back to her cast area after chunking me, I nearly gave away 2 kills in lane because of this, I finally figured out how to play the matchup and started to play smart and as soon as she'd throw her Q out I'd throw mine out before she could cast W and I'd start getting some favourable trades and even kills as a result, I ended up winning this game but predictive play remains my biggest weakness, whats yours???

replies.body: probably believing that people are competent in what they are doing at all stages of the game. all too often people are just roaming about and walk into 3-5 people in a bush and die and still blame someone else for feeding one of them. so i just mute anyone that even starts talking negatively to myself or my team and even the opposing team
I play too passive. There are numerous moments in lane when I could and should engage but generally just turn a lane into a farm fest. Saying that, farming is probably my biggest strength heh

For me probably my lack of committing to learning champs properly. I tend to get bored and play many different champs rather than sticking to a few and really progressing my skills. I believe the highest mastery level with any champ I own is level 3 max. Most are level 1.
I flash starcall under tower as Soraka because I have dem mid lamer instinct. Sometimes I ulti and remember my global ulti is a heal

realising theres an afk/feeder on my team. it starts the chain of knowing im going to lose, into actually losing, into nobody wanting to surrender because 90% of the teammates ive ever had have the worst gauge for determining our chances for winning with the assumptions that our enemies know the slightest bit about wtf they're doing
My biggest weakness would be overextending or playing aggressive without vision and the tiny champion pool I have.
My biggest weakness is basically the small champion pool I have....
Darius... Every champ i love to play gets the **** beaten out of them by darius and ever since his release i have just hated facing him.  {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
I like really playing Quinn as ADC. :/
Mechanics, I'm that ADC who stands still ahaha :D
For me its the adc ether not knowing how to play there champion or not knowing where Right Click is on their mouse {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
